name: The House of Horrors (CuriousCinni)
description:
A game created for a University Game Jam, where the theme was "Are we the bad guys?"

You snap to your senses in a dimly lit house filled with zombies that are out to kill you! Defeat them all and escape the house!

Controls
  • Left controller stick - Movement
  • Right controller stick - Turn player
  • Right trigger - Shoot gun
Credit

Programming and most of the artwork done by myself

Sound Effects + Music - https://zapsplat.com
